channel.title: Weed UPDATED
channel.description:
I don't have a bong or anything so I was thinking I could just use a glass bottle. Would it work if I just through in the weed, dropped a match in there and inhaled the smoke?
and in a joint you just roll it up in paper, light the end and inhale from the other?

item.title: Weed UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“shpoanator, post:1, topic:205943”]I don’t have a bong or anything so I was thinking I could just use a glass bottle. Would it work if I just through in the weed, dropped a match in there and inhaled the smoke?

and in a joint you just roll it up in paper, light the end and inhale from the other?[/quote]

Alright, this most certainly will not work.

You need to construct some better smoking paraphernalia. And for the joint, partly but it’s not that easy.

What you really need is a buddy who is experienced with this shit and can show you everything you need to know IRL.

Also, to make it easy for you, get ahold of a cigarette. Get rid of all the tobacco in it, and fill it with weed. I would also remove the cig filter and replace it with like, not carboard but a card type of paper. Like a slice of a rolled up business card.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Get a 2litre bottle, and cut it around half way, so you end up with two halfs.

Use the top half and tape a bag to the bottom of it, get a gauze ( If your first time just get some tinfoil, put over where the lid is meant to go and then prick little holes through it ), burn some bud in the makeshift gauze and as it starts to smoke slowly pull the plastic bag you taped to the bottle down.

Pull the gauze off and inhale.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

shpoanator:

What I understand is, all I need is something that will contain the smoke. I find a way to light it inside the container. The smoke will build up. Then i open a hole and breathe it in. Is this correct?

Why not just smoke a blunt? If you don’t know how to roll one, just have the person you’re buying the weed from roll it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Weed UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @shpoanator shpoanator
item.description:
@shpoanator wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:5, topic:205943”][quote author=shpoanator link=topic=271672.msg2226853#msg2226853 date=1210910452]
What I understand is, all I need is something that will contain the smoke. I find a way to light it inside the container. The smoke will build up. Then i open a hole and breathe it in. Is this correct?
[/quote]
Wouldn’t that just make the smoke go into the air?
Well, sort of. Usually the weed is place outside the container, on top of little holes in the container, then you light it and suck the smoke through a different hole in a container.
For instance, to make a pop can pipe, you would make a dent on the side of the can to form a bowl, then you would poke several holes in the bottom of the bowl with a thumb tack or other sharp object, and place the weed in the bowl on top of the holes. You would then light the weed, and suck the smoke through from underneath, by sucking on the hole where you would usually drink from on the can.[/quote]

Read full topic
